events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer issue was reviewed and labeled under the Refund category based on the message content.
The support ticket was assigned to agent Emily R. for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'll help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Thank you for responding. My order number is 587493021. I have attached a photo showing the item does not match what I ordered.
We have reviewed your case and will issue a full refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days. Please keep the incorrect item with you for now.
Thanks for helping me quickly. I appreciate the prompt refund offer and look forward to getting the money back soon.
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your statement shortly. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Just following up to confirm that your refund was received and to see if thereâ€™s anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing your support case now as resolved. Thank you for your patience and please reach out anytime if needed.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
